author: ralexstokes
content:
we hit BPO1 on holesky just a few minutes ago

looks _ok_ so far, i think a few more orphans than expected, but blocks are coming thru with the new max blob count

author: terencechain
content: hm.. does https://light-holesky.beaconcha.in/ need an update? it still thinks 9 blobs as max i think

author: ralexstokes
content: yeah looks like something is off in the UI

author: samcm
content: We're tracking a decrease in online validators just after the fork, but it appears those validators have since recovered

author: philngo
content: Lodestar was updating a bunch of holesky servers with a regression. It completed updating not too long before the BPO1 fork. So if you can correlate those to us, the offline validators were planned

author: philngo
content: Oh nevermind, those ones were after the fork lol

author: barnabasbusa
content:
fusaka-devnet-3 bugs:

nimbus-besu-1: nimbus crashlooping <@785811170387951616> <@654267572107083777> 
nimbus-besu-2: besu reports: `2025-10-07 09:27:01.991+0000 | nioEventLoopGroup-3-6 | INFO  | MainnetBlockValidator | Invalid block 391977 (0x16128d32cf6fb3b42e71d17ebedfa3fd9f3506c2d43dcdb0e3cf1842aa3c787f): Optional[Unable to process block because parent world state 0x695a4b7cbecaff721ba2af29c5e8e6bfbbb02f7fd9ce3b548519c7788b1ecd75 is not available]` <@680245613258211336> <@761154847432769577> 
grandine-besu-2: ```
2025-10-07 09:29:23.321+0000 | vertx-blocked-thread-checker | WARN  | BlockedThreadChecker | Thread Thread[vert.x-worker-thread-8,5,main] has been blocked for 653266188 ms, time limit is 60000 ms
io.vertx.core.VertxException: Thread blocked
```
lighthouse-nethermind-1: nethermind can't seem to keep up to head <@277500722655002624> 

lodestar-besu-1: out of disk <@578356786889752586> <@931591385545584640> - this seems rather strange, I have just cleaned up the db, but lodestar seems to consume a crazy amount of disk on besu and nethermind 1 while having little usage on [other](https://grafana.observability.ethpandaops.io/d/MRfYwus7k/nodes?orgId=1&from=now-3h&to=now&timezone=browser&var-consensus_client=lodestar&var-execution_client=$__all&var-network=fusaka-devnet-3&var-supernode=$__all&var-filter=ingress_user%7C!~%7Csynctest.*&viewPanel=panel-14) client pairs. 
lodestar-nethermind-1: out of disk ^ haven't cleaned this one up. Might worth investigating.

author: jameshe5018
content: <@491624610215886849> do you guys still support /eth/v1/beacon/blob_sidecars/{block_id} post fusaka? i guess same for other clients

author: ralexstokes
content: its marked deprecated in the latest API specs

author: pawandhananjay
content: we do, haven't removed support post fusaka yet

author: jameshe5018
content: yes but some of us ( like prysm ) will still continue to support it for a period
